definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Anybody who set himself up as king, without being appointed king by the Senate, that was itself an act of treason.
sentences.chinese: 任何人自稱爲王，而不受元老院冊封，那就是叛國罪。

sentences.english: You Catiline, who the consul and the senate shall lead to death.
sentences.chinese: 你，卡提林，執政官和元老院應該讓你去死。

sentences.english: The senate of 400 founded by Solon in ancient athens.
sentences.chinese: 古代雅典由梭倫創建的由400人組成的元老院。

sentences.english: Hence the praetorship remained as the portal through which the sons of senators could enter the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 不過擔任財務官仍舊是元老後代進入元老院的門徑。

sentences.english: The majority of Senators continued to be Patricians .
sentences.chinese: 元老院中的成員最後多半成爲貴族。

sentences.english: Caesar is stabbed by the senators; Christ is cuffed by lackeys .
sentences.chinese: 愷撤被元老院議員刺死，耶穌捱了奴僕的巴掌。

sentences.english: And the princeps ' personalities effected the relations between the princeps and the Senate directly.
sentences.chinese: 元首個人品性的差別直接影響着元老院和元首的關係。

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
